bibl.title: From Greek Lyric to Rap Song: A New Swiss Sappho? (An Impertinent Comparison). Translation by James Kierstead.
bibl.note: 1. The comparative approach. - 2. From mélos to rap: an improbable comparison. - 3. Comparandum: Steff la Cheffe of Bern and Annabelle. - 4. Comparatum: Sappho of Lesbos and Helen of Troy [Fr. 16 V.]. - 5. From comparison of differences to comparison of similarities.

bibl.title: Donum natalicium digitaliter confectum Gregorio Nagy septuagenario a discipulis collegis familiaribus oblatum. A Virtual Birthday Gift Presented to Gregory Nagy on Turning Seventy by his Students, Colleagues and Friends.

bibl.seg: Calame Claude, From Greek Lyric to Rap Song: A New Swiss Sappho? (An Impertinent Comparison). Translation by James Kierstead.

Victor Bers, David Elmer, Douglas Frame and Leonard Muellner (Edd.), Donum natalicium digitaliter confectum Gregorio Nagy septuagenario a discipulis collegis familiaribus oblatum. A Virtual Birthday Gift Presented to Gregory Nagy on Turning Seventy by his Students, Colleagues and Friends (Washington, D.C., 2012) s.p. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://chs.harvard.edu/wa/pageR?tn=ArticleWrapper&bdc=12&mn=4606 >.]

1. The comparative approach. - 2. From mélos to rap: an improbable comparison. - 3. Comparandum: Steff la Cheffe of Bern and Annabelle. - 4. Comparatum: Sappho of Lesbos and Helen of Troy [Fr. 16 V.]. - 5. From comparison of differences to comparison of similarities.
